text: Rex may refer to: * Rex (title) (Latin: king, ruler, monarch), a royal title ** King of Rome (Latin: Rex Romae), chief magistrate of the Roman Kingdom == Animals == ===Dogs=== * Rex (dog), once owned by Ronald Reagan * Rex (search and rescue dog), a dog that received a 1945 Dickin Medal for bravery ===Other animals=== * -rex, a taxonomic suffix used to describe certain large animals
title: Rex
